description: SQL statements for Platform Observability Dashboard

overview_total_cost_summary.description: Key financial metrics for the last 30 days
overview_total_cost_summary.sql:
WITH cost_summary AS (
  SELECT 
    SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
    COUNT(DISTINCT workspace_id) as active_workspaces,
    COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities,
    AVG(list_cost_usd) as avg_daily_cost
  FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
  WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
)
SELECT 
  'Total Cost (30 days)' as metric,
  CONCAT('$', FORMAT_NUMBER(total_cost_usd, 2)) as value,
  'USD' as unit
FROM cost_summary
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Active Workspaces' as metric,
  CAST(active_workspaces AS STRING) as value,
  'count' as unit
FROM cost_summary
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Active Entities' as metric,
  CAST(active_entities AS STRING) as value,
  'count' as unit
FROM cost_summary
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Avg Daily Cost' as metric,
  CONCAT('$', FORMAT_NUMBER(avg_daily_cost, 2)) as value,
  'USD/day' as unit
FROM cost_summary

overview_cost_trend.description: Daily cost trends with 7-day rolling average
overview_cost_trend.sql:
SELECT 
  date_sk,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as daily_cost_usd,
  AVG(SUM(list_cost_usd)) OVER (ORDER BY date_sk ROWS 6 PRECEDING) as rolling_7day_avg
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY date_sk
ORDER BY date_sk

overview_top_cost_centers.description: Top 10 cost centers by total cost
overview_top_cost_centers.sql:
SELECT 
  cost_center,
  line_of_business,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id), 2) as cost_per_entity
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
  AND cost_center != 'unallocated'
GROUP BY cost_center, line_of_business
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC
LIMIT 10

overview_runtime_health.sql:
WITH runtime_health AS (
  SELECT 
    c.dbr_version,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.cluster_id) as cluster_count,
    SUM(f.list_cost_usd) as total_cost,
    CASE 
      WHEN c.dbr_version LIKE '%13.%' THEN 'Current'
      WHEN c.dbr_version LIKE '%12.%' THEN 'Recent'
      WHEN c.dbr_version LIKE '%11.%' THEN 'Older'
      ELSE 'Legacy'
    END as version_category
  FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day f
  JOIN platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_dim_cluster c ON f.cluster_key = c.cluster_key
  WHERE f.date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
    AND c.is_current = true
  GROUP BY c.dbr_version, version_category
)
SELECT 
  version_category,
  COUNT(*) as runtime_versions,
  SUM(cluster_count) as total_clusters,
  SUM(total_cost) as total_cost_usd
FROM runtime_health
GROUP BY version_category
ORDER BY 
  CASE version_category
    WHEN 'Current' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Recent' THEN 2
    WHEN 'Older' THEN 3
    ELSE 4
  END

finance_monthly_cost_breakdown.description: Monthly cost breakdown by cost center and line of business
finance_monthly_cost_breakdown.sql:
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM') as month,
  cost_center,
  line_of_business,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id), 2) as cost_per_entity
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE cost_center != 'unallocated'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 90), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM'), cost_center, line_of_business
ORDER BY month DESC, total_cost_usd DESC

finance_daily_cost_trends.description: Daily cost trends with rolling averages for budget monitoring
finance_daily_cost_trends.sql:
SELECT 
  date_sk,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as daily_cost_usd,
  AVG(SUM(list_cost_usd)) OVER (ORDER BY date_sk ROWS 6 PRECEDING) as rolling_7day_avg,
  AVG(SUM(list_cost_usd)) OVER (ORDER BY date_sk ROWS 29 PRECEDING) as rolling_30day_avg
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 90), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY date_sk
ORDER BY date_sk

finance_cost_center_analysis.description: Cost center analysis with month-over-month trends
finance_cost_center_analysis.sql:
WITH cost_summary AS (
  SELECT 
    cost_center,
    line_of_business,
    DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM') as month,
    SUM(list_cost_usd) as monthly_cost,
    COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities
  FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
  WHERE cost_center != 'unallocated'
    AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 90), 'yyyyMMdd')
  GROUP BY cost_center, line_of_business, DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM')
)
SELECT 
  cost_center,
  line_of_business,
  month,
  monthly_cost,
  active_entities,
  ROUND(monthly_cost / active_entities, 2) as cost_per_entity,
  LAG(monthly_cost) OVER (PARTITION BY cost_center ORDER BY month) as prev_month_cost,
  ROUND((monthly_cost - LAG(monthly_cost) OVER (PARTITION BY cost_center ORDER BY month)) / 
        LAG(monthly_cost) OVER (PARTITION BY cost_center ORDER BY month) * 100, 2) as cost_change_pct
FROM cost_summary
ORDER BY cost_center, month

finance_unallocated_cost_analysis.description: Analysis of unallocated costs and coverage
finance_unallocated_cost_analysis.sql:
SELECT 
  'Unallocated Cost' as category,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as unallocated_entities,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / (SELECT SUM(list_cost_usd) FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day 
                            WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')) * 100, 2) as percentage_of_total
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE cost_center = 'unallocated'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Total Cost' as category,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as total_entities,
  100.0 as percentage_of_total
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')

platform_runtime_analysis.description: Runtime version distribution and upgrade priorities
platform_runtime_analysis.sql:
SELECT 
  c.dbr_version,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.cluster_id) as cluster_count,
  SUM(f.list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  AVG(f.duration_hours) as avg_duration_hours,
  CASE 
    WHEN c.dbr_version LIKE '%13.%' THEN 'Current'
    WHEN c.dbr_version LIKE '%12.%' THEN 'Recent' 
    WHEN c.dbr_version LIKE '%11.%' THEN 'Older'
    ELSE 'Legacy'
  END as version_category
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day f
JOIN platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_dim_cluster c ON f.cluster_key = c.cluster_key
WHERE f.date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
  AND c.is_current = true
GROUP BY c.dbr_version, version_category
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

platform_cluster_sizing.description: Cluster sizing patterns and optimization opportunities
platform_cluster_sizing.sql:
SELECT 
  c.worker_node_type_category,
  c.dbr_version,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.cluster_id) as cluster_count,
  SUM(f.list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  AVG(f.duration_hours) as avg_duration_hours,
  ROUND(SUM(f.list_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT f.job_run_id), 2) as cost_per_run
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day f
JOIN platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_dim_cluster c ON f.cluster_key = c.cluster_key
WHERE f.date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
  AND c.is_current = true
GROUP BY c.worker_node_type_category, c.dbr_version
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

platform_autoscaling_analysis.sql:
SELECT 
  c.cluster_name,
  c.worker_node_type_category,
  c.min_autoscale_workers,
  c.max_autoscale_workers,
  (c.max_autoscale_workers - c.min_autoscale_workers) as scaling_range,
  AVG(f.duration_hours) as avg_duration_hours,
  SUM(f.list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  CASE 
    WHEN (c.max_autoscale_workers - c.min_autoscale_workers) > 5 THEN 'High Range'
    WHEN (c.max_autoscale_workers - c.min_autoscale_workers) > 2 THEN 'Medium Range'
    ELSE 'Low Range'
  END as scaling_category
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day f
JOIN platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_dim_cluster c ON f.cluster_key = c.cluster_key
WHERE f.date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
  AND c.is_current = true
GROUP BY c.cluster_name, c.worker_node_type_category, 
         c.min_autoscale_workers, c.max_autoscale_workers, scaling_category
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

platform_workflow_hierarchy.sql:
SELECT 
  workflow_level,
  parent_workflow_name,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as entity_count,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  AVG(list_cost_usd) as avg_cost_per_entity,
  COUNT(DISTINCT workspace_id) as workspace_count
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE workflow_level != 'STANDALONE'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY workflow_level, parent_workflow_name
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

data_tag_coverage.sql:
WITH tag_coverage AS (
  SELECT 
    workspace_id,
    COUNT(*) as total_records,
    SUM(CASE WHEN cost_center != 'unallocated' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as cost_center_tagged,
    SUM(CASE WHEN line_of_business != 'Unknown' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as lob_tagged,
    SUM(CASE WHEN department != 'unknown' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as dept_tagged,
    SUM(CASE WHEN environment != 'dev' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as env_tagged
  FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
  WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
  GROUP BY workspace_id
)
SELECT 
  workspace_id,
  total_records,
  ROUND(cost_center_tagged / total_records * 100, 2) as cost_center_coverage_pct,
  ROUND(lob_tagged / total_records * 100, 2) as lob_coverage_pct,
  ROUND(dept_tagged / total_records * 100, 2) as dept_coverage_pct,
  ROUND(env_tagged / total_records * 100, 2) as env_coverage_pct,
  ROUND((cost_center_tagged + lob_tagged + dept_tagged + env_tagged) / (total_records * 4) * 100, 2) as overall_coverage_pct
FROM tag_coverage
ORDER BY overall_coverage_pct ASC

data_usage_patterns.description: Usage patterns by environment and hour of day
data_usage_patterns.sql:
SELECT 
  environment,
  HOUR(FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(date_sk AS STRING), 'yyyyMMdd'))) as hour_of_day,
  COUNT(*) as usage_count,
  SUM(usage_quantity) as total_usage,
  AVG(usage_quantity) as avg_usage,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY environment, HOUR(FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CAST(date_sk AS STRING), 'yyyyMMdd')))
ORDER BY environment, hour_of_day

data_entity_usage.sql:
SELECT 
  entity_type,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as unique_entities,
  SUM(usage_quantity) as total_usage,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  AVG(usage_quantity) as avg_usage_per_entity,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id), 2) as cost_per_entity
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY entity_type
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

data_quality_issues.description: Summary of data quality issues and affected costs
data_quality_issues.sql:
SELECT 
  'Missing Cost Center' as issue_type,
  COUNT(*) as record_count,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as affected_cost_usd
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE cost_center = 'unallocated'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Missing Line of Business' as issue_type,
  COUNT(*) as record_count,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as affected_cost_usd
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE line_of_business = 'Unknown'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Missing Department' as issue_type,
  COUNT(*) as record_count,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as affected_cost_usd
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE department = 'unknown'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
ORDER BY affected_cost_usd DESC

business_unit_performance.description: Business unit cost and usage summary
business_unit_performance.sql:
SELECT 
  line_of_business,
  use_case,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  SUM(usage_quantity) as total_usage,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id), 2) as cost_per_entity,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / SUM(usage_quantity), 4) as cost_per_unit_usage
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE line_of_business != 'Unknown'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY line_of_business, use_case
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

business_monthly_trends.sql:
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM') as month,
  line_of_business,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as monthly_cost_usd,
  SUM(usage_quantity) as monthly_usage,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id), 2) as cost_per_entity,
  LAG(SUM(list_cost_usd)) OVER (PARTITION BY line_of_business ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM')) as prev_month_cost,
  ROUND((SUM(list_cost_usd) - LAG(SUM(list_cost_usd)) OVER (PARTITION BY line_of_business ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM'))) / 
        LAG(SUM(list_cost_usd)) OVER (PARTITION BY line_of_business ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM')) * 100, 2) as cost_change_pct
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE line_of_business != 'Unknown'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 90), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date_sk, 'yyyy-MM'), line_of_business
ORDER BY line_of_business, month

business_department_performance.sql:
SELECT 
  department,
  cost_center,
  COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities,
  COUNT(DISTINCT workspace_id) as active_workspaces,
  SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  AVG(list_cost_usd) as avg_cost_per_record,
  ROUND(SUM(list_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id), 2) as cost_per_entity
FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
WHERE department != 'unknown'
  AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY department, cost_center
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

business_roi_analysis.description: ROI analysis by use case and business unit
business_roi_analysis.sql:
WITH use_case_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    use_case,
    line_of_business,
    COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) as active_entities,
    SUM(list_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
    SUM(usage_quantity) as total_usage,
    AVG(duration_hours) as avg_duration_hours
  FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day
  WHERE use_case != 'Unknown'
    AND date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 30), 'yyyyMMdd')
  GROUP BY use_case, line_of_business
)
SELECT 
  use_case,
  line_of_business,
  active_entities,
  total_cost_usd,
  total_usage,
  avg_duration_hours,
  ROUND(total_cost_usd / active_entities, 2) as cost_per_entity,
  ROUND(total_usage / active_entities, 2) as usage_per_entity,
  ROUND(total_cost_usd / total_usage, 4) as cost_per_unit_usage,
  CASE 
    WHEN total_cost_usd / active_entities < 100 THEN 'Low Cost'
    WHEN total_cost_usd / active_entities < 500 THEN 'Medium Cost'
    ELSE 'High Cost'
  END as cost_category
FROM use_case_metrics
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC

alert_unallocated_cost.description: Alert query for unallocated cost percentage
alert_unallocated_cost.sql: SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN cost_center = 'unallocated' THEN list_cost_usd ELSE 0 END) / SUM(list_cost_usd) * 100, 2) as unallocated_cost_percentage FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 7), 'yyyyMMdd')

alert_legacy_runtime.description: Alert query for legacy runtime detection
alert_legacy_runtime.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.cluster_id) as legacy_cluster_count FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day f JOIN platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_dim_cluster c ON f.cluster_key = c.cluster_key WHERE c.dbr_version NOT LIKE '%13.%' AND c.dbr_version NOT LIKE '%12.%' AND c.is_current = true

alert_tag_coverage.description: Alert query for tag coverage percentage
alert_tag_coverage.sql: WITH tag_coverage AS (SELECT workspace_id, COUNT(*) as total_records, SUM(CASE WHEN cost_center != 'unallocated' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as cost_center_tagged, SUM(CASE WHEN line_of_business != 'Unknown' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as lob_tagged, SUM(CASE WHEN department != 'unknown' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as dept_tagged, SUM(CASE WHEN environment != 'dev' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as env_tagged FROM platform_observability.plt_gold.gld_fact_usage_priced_day WHERE date_key >= date_format(date_sub(current_date(), 7), 'yyyyMMdd') GROUP BY workspace_id) SELECT AVG(ROUND((cost_center_tagged + lob_tagged + dept_tagged + env_tagged) / (total_records * 4) * 100, 2)) as overall_coverage_pct FROM tag_coverage
